stringTranslations.error_crafting_no_sufficient_tool_owned: &cYou do not possess a tool sufficient to craft this item
stringTranslations.error_command_no_permission: &cYou do not have permission to use this command
stringTranslations.error_command_recipe_exists: &cA recipe with this name already exists.
stringTranslations.error_command_insufficient_level_tokens: &cNot enough redeemable level tokens, you have &4%amount%
stringTranslations.error_command_insufficient_exp_tokens: &cNot enough redeemable exp tokens, you have &4%amount%
stringTranslations.error_command_modifier_failed: &cThis item &7(%item%)&c is incompatible with this modifier &7(executed on %player%)
stringTranslations.error_command_vanilla_effects_illegal: &cVanilla effects cannot be applied with this command
stringTranslations.error_command_global_buff_expired: &cThis effect either does not exist or has already expired
stringTranslations.error_command_resourcepack: &cSomething went wrong in fetching the resource pack
stringTranslations.error_command_advanced_modifier_unusable: &cAdvanced item modifiers are unusable in command format. Sorry!
stringTranslations.status_command_global_buff_warning: &aGlobal effect named %effect% applied, but it may not do anything because it was not registered!
stringTranslations.status_onetime_crafting_recipe_selected: &7Crafting recipe &a%recipe%&7 selected. Hold right click on the block to craft!
stringTranslations.status_onetime_tinkering_recipe_selected: &7Tinkering method &a%recipe%&7 selected. Hold right click on the block with &a%item% &7to tinker!
stringTranslations.status_command_resourcepack_downloaded: &aResource pack successfully downloaded! File location plugins/ValhallaMMO/ValhallaMMO_pack.zip
stringTranslations.status_command_resourcepack_setup: &aResource pack successfully downloaded and installed! Restart the server to reflect the changes
stringTranslations.status_command_revealrecipes_enabled: &aThe names of crafted recipes are now shown to you
stringTranslations.status_command_revealrecipes_disabled: &cThe names of crafted recipes are now hidden from you
stringTranslations.status_command_party_created_by_admin: &aA party named &2%party% &ahas been created in your name
stringTranslations.status_command_party_target_higher_rank: &cYou can't do this to a member of higher rank
stringTranslations.status_command_party_rank_higher_sender: &cYou can't do this with ranks higher or equal to your own
stringTranslations.status_command_party_sender_not_leader: &cYou must be leader of the party to do this
stringTranslations.status_command_party_not_in_same_party: &cYou're not in the same party as this player
stringTranslations.status_command_party_party_not_found: &cParty could not be found or has been deleted
stringTranslations.status_command_party_invalid_stat: &cNo stat of this type with this name exists, valid stats are %stats%
stringTranslations.status_command_party_feature_not_unlocke: &cYour party either doesn't have this feature unlocked or has it disabled
stringTranslations.status_command_party_cannot_kick_leader: &cThe leader cannot leave the party before transferring ownership
stringTranslations.status_command_party_no_item_held: &cYou need to be holding an item for Item Share
stringTranslations.status_command_party_character_limit_rea: &cCharacter limit exceeded, think of a shorter name/description
stringTranslations.status_command_party_invalid_characters_: &cIllegal characters used, valid characters are: 0-9, a-z, A-Z, &
stringTranslations.status_command_party_closed: &7Party is now closed to free joining
stringTranslations.status_command_party_invite_received: &a%player% has invited you to join %party%! Type &2/party join %party_id% &ato join
stringTranslations.status_command_party_disband_confirmatio: &cThis cannot be undone and all party progress will be lost, are you sure? &4/party disband confirm
stringTranslations.leaderboard_unranked: &7%player% is not on the leaderboard yet!
stringTranslations.warning_command_reload: &cWarning! Changes made to recipes and loot tables will be saved before the reload and will cause a lag spike. Type &4/val reload confirm&c to really reload
stringTranslations.warning_profile_reset: &cHold on! This type of reset cannot be undone and will completely reset (part of) the player's progress. Execute this command again to reset, otherwise let the request expire in 10 seconds.
stringTranslations.warning_command_import: &cHold on! Importing recipes may cause a lag spike, execute this command again within 10 seconds to proceed anyway.
stringTranslations.description_command_help: Shows a list of all your available commands
stringTranslations.description_command_profile: View detailed stats about a player's skill
stringTranslations.description_command_exp: Gives you or a player an amount of skill experience
stringTranslations.description_command_modify: Modifies a held item given a modifier and strength
stringTranslations.description_command_attribute: Applies an attribute to a held item
stringTranslations.description_command_effect: Gives any player any custom potion effect
stringTranslations.description_command_potionattribute: Applies a custom potion effect to the held item
stringTranslations.description_command_reward: Executes a Perk Reward onto a player with the given argument
stringTranslations.description_command_loot: Accesses ValhallaMMO's custom loot table manager
stringTranslations.description_command_globalbuff: Add or cancel global effects like increased EXP gain for everyone
stringTranslations.description_command_reload: Reloads all the configs into memory, &cthis saves changes made to recipes and loot tables which may cause a lag spike
stringTranslations.description_command_givebook: Gives you or other players the "getting started" book for ValhallaMMO
stringTranslations.description_command_import: Imports all recipes from a file present in the recipes folder, can override or skip existing recipes.
stringTranslations.description_command_resourcepack: Use &edownload &7 to download a copy of the ValhallaMMO resource pack or use &esetup &7to both download and install the pack onto the server. This overrides any resource pack changes in server.properties
stringTranslations.description_command_itemindex: Save an item under an ID so it may later be used in recipe modifiers
stringTranslations.description_command_hidebossbars: Toggles the visibility of boss bars to indicate experience gain for a player
stringTranslations.description_command_revealrecipes: Allows you to view the exact names of the vanilla recipes you're crafting, allowing you to disable them in config.yml
stringTranslations.description_command_loottables: Allows you to manage and edit the plugin's loot tables
stringTranslations.description_command_tool: Allows you to give yourself one of a limited selection of tools with specialized purposes
stringTranslations.description_command_saveall: Forces the plugin to save all current progress
stringTranslations.description_command_armorsets: Allows you to manage and create new armor sets with stat buffs. Armor set application on items should be done with modifiers
stringTranslations.description_command_items: Allows you to add custom items to the plugin's item collection, for usage in /val give or in modifiers
stringTranslations.description_command_give: Allows you to give a player an item from the plugin's item collection, defined in /val items
stringTranslations.description_command_hardness: Allows you to change the default hardness of block types
stringTranslations.perk_requirement_warning_outdated: &cThis perk is not functional in this version!
stringTranslations.modifier_warning_counter_exceeded_player: &cYou currently can't apply more upgrade slots
stringTranslations.skill-power-description: &8Level other skills to get exp for your power level. Level up to get skill points to spend on other any perk
stringTranslations.skill-smithing-description: &8Practice Smithing to make tools and equipment of increasingly superior quality
stringTranslations.skill-mining-description: &8Practice Mining to increase your ore extraction, increase the effectiveness of blast mining, and to gain rare minerals useful in crafting
stringTranslations.skill-light-weapons-description: &8Light Weapons aren't very effective against heavy plate armor, but attack much faster and with enough practice are able to deflect attacks
stringTranslations.skill-light-armor-description: &8Practice Light Armor to improve your evasion and stay protected without sacrificing much mobility.
stringTranslations.skill-woodcutting-description: &8Practice Woodcutting to increase your wood harvesting, to augment your building skills, and to gain more building material from less resources
stringTranslations.skill-digging-description: &8Practice Digging to increase your bounty from the earth, to find more treasure in archaeology, and to gain the ability to sift small items from sand and gravel
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-weapons-description: &8Heavy Weapons aren't very effective at blocking incoming attacks, but hit much harder and are more effective against armor
stringTranslations.skill-heavy-armor-description: &8Practice Heavy Armor to greatly reduce damage taken, and become an undefeatable menace at the cost of some mobility
stringTranslations.skill-fishing-description: &8Practice Fishing to... get more fish. And to find sunken treasure. Use bait to get rare items more frequently
stringTranslations.skill-farming-description: &8Practice Farming to increase the bounty of your harvest and animals, to safely harvest honey, and to collect rare plants and ingredients.
stringTranslations.skill-enchanting-description: &8Practice Enchanting to enhance your ability to imbue items with magic, both on the enchanting table and the anvil. Achieve enchantment levels previously impossible
stringTranslations.skill-archery-description: &8Practice Archery to increase your ranged damage, improve your accuracy, and kill targets consistently at a safe distance. Practicing archery takes a long time, but it's arguably the strongest of all the combat skills
stringTranslations.heavy-weapons-warning-dual-wielding: TITLE(&cToo Heavy! Attack speed reduced;&7Can't wield two items with heavy weaponry;40;5)
stringTranslations.skill-alchemy-description: &8Practice Alchemy to make potions and poisons of extreme potency, and learn how to transmute materials
stringTranslations.woodcutting_perk_1_description: &7Speeds up your woodcutting by &a10%&7, and you gain a few experience orbs per block
stringTranslations.woodcutting_perk_2_description: &7Leaves sometimes drop &aGolden Apples&7, and you gain a few more experience orbs per block
stringTranslations.woodcutting_perk_4_description: &7Speeds up your woodcutting by &a20%&7, you gain a lot more experience orbs per block, and placed saplings grow twice as fast.
stringTranslations.woodcutting_perk_5_description: &7Leaves sometimes drop &aJewelled Apples&7, and Golden Apples drop more frequently.
stringTranslations.woodcutting_perk_capitator_a_description: &7Empowers Tree Capitator to a 32-block limit, and lowers cooldown to 7 seconds.
stringTranslations.woodcutting_perk_capitator_b_description: &7Empowers Tree Capitator to a 128-block limit, and lowers cooldown to 3 seconds.
stringTranslations.woodcutting_perk_combo_description: &7Increases the nutritional value of many foods, reduces hunger consumption, and increases health regeneration
stringTranslations.smithing_perk_1_description: &7Greatly buffs the quality of your &eWooden&7 and &eLeather&7 items.
stringTranslations.smithing_perk_2_description: &7Greatly buffs the quality of your &eStone&7 and &eChainmail&7 items.
stringTranslations.smithing_perk_3_description: &7Greatly buffs the quality of your &eIron&7 and &eGold&7 items.
stringTranslations.smithing_perk_4_description: &7Greatly buffs the quality of your &eDiamond&7 items.
stringTranslations.smithing_perk_5_description: &7Greatly buffs the quality of your &eNetherite&7 items.
stringTranslations.smithing_perk_6_description: &7Having truly mastered your craft, all your creations benefit from a &e{smithing_genericcraftingskill_add} &7bonus in quality
stringTranslations.smithing_perk_prismarine_description: &7Grants you the ability to craft tridents
stringTranslations.smithing_perk_enderic_description: &7Grants you the ability to craft elytras
stringTranslations.smithing_perk_bows_description: &7Greatly buffs the quality of your &eBows&7 and &eCrossbows
stringTranslations.alchemy_perk_2_description: &7Grants a &d{alchemy_brewingingredientsavechance_add} &7chance to not spend ingredients during brewing
stringTranslations.alchemy_perk_a1_description: &7Enhances the quality of your poisons. Your indirect hits with splash potions become stronger
stringTranslations.alchemy_perk_a2_description: &7Enhances the quality of your poisons further. Enhances your splash potion intensity, lingering potion duration and radius, and throwing force.
stringTranslations.alchemy_perk_b1_description: &7Enhances the quality of your beneficial potions. Speeds up potion brewing by &d{alchemy_brewingtimereduction_add}
stringTranslations.alchemy_perk_b2_description: &7Increases chance to not spend ingredients by &d{alchemy_brewingingredientsavechance_add}&7 and unlocks &dHaste&7 and &dHealth Boost&7 potion recipes
stringTranslations.alchemy_perk_3_description: &7Allows you to merge the effects of multiple potions into one, up to &d{alchemy_potioncombiningmaxcombinations_add}&7 times, at some loss of duration
stringTranslations.alchemy_perk_4_description: &7Greatly buffs the quality of all your potions. Unlocks &dTransmutation
stringTranslations.alchemy_perk_combo_description: &7Adds &d{lightweapons_coatingcharges_add} &7charges to your Weapon Coating ability. You unlock recipes for a couple simple poisons that can be crafted without a brewing stand
stringTranslations.mining_perk_1_description: &7Speeds up your mining by &e{mining_miningspeedbonus_add}&7 and you gain a few experience orbs per block
stringTranslations.mining_perk_2_description: &7Increases mining drops by &e{mining_miningdrops_add}&7 and luck by &e{mining_miningluck_add}&7. Increases cooking speed by &e{power_cookingspeedbonus_add}
stringTranslations.mining_perk_a1_description: &7Increases TNT blast radius and damage resistance by &e{mining_tntblastradius_add}&7, and increases blasting drops by &e{mining_blastingdrops_add}
stringTranslations.mining_perk_a2_description: &eDoubles &7the effects of Demolist, and you gain triple the TNT when crafting.
stringTranslations.mining_perk_a3_description: &7Allows you to pick between &eSilk Touch &7and &eFortune II&7 as enchantments to apply on all your TNT
stringTranslations.mining_perk_a3silktouch_description: &7Your TNT breaks blocks as if broken with a Silk Touch pickaxe
stringTranslations.mining_perk_a3fortune_description: &7Your TNT breaks blocks as if broken with a Fortune II pickaxe
stringTranslations.mining_perk_b1_description: &7Speeds up your mining by &e{mining_miningspeedbonus_add}&7, increases experience orbs per block, and unlocks the &eDrilling &7ability
stringTranslations.mining_perk_b2_description: &7Increases mining drops by &e{mining_miningdrops_add}&7 and luck by &e{mining_miningluck_add}&7. Unlocks &eVein Mining&7and increases cooking speed by &e{power_cookingspeedbonus_add}
stringTranslations.mining_perk_3_description: &7Increases drilling speed by another &e{mining_drillingspeedbonus_add}&7, and &ehalves &7its cooldown. You gain &edouble &7experience orbs from blocks and increases cooking speed by &e{power_cookingspeedbonus_add}
stringTranslations.mining_perk_4_description: &7Your Vein Mining ability may now vein-mine blocks like &eAndesite, Granite, Diorite, and other common non-stone blocks&7. Its drops are now also instantly transferred to your inventory. Increases cooking speed by &e{power_cookingspeedbonus_add}
stringTranslations.archery_perk_3_description: &7Unlocks &eCopper and Golden Arrows&7, improves accuracy further, and grants &e{archery_bowcritchance_add} &7critical strike chance
stringTranslations.archery_perk_4_description: &7Unlocks &eIron and Enderic Arrows&7, increases ranged damage by &e{archery_bowdamagemultiplier_add}&7 and you deal more damage the further away you are from the target. Decreases ammo consumption by &e{archery_ammosavechance_add}
stringTranslations.archery_perk_5_description: &7Unlocks &eDiamond Arrows&7, increases critical strike chance by &e{archery_bowcritchance_add}&7 and critical strike damage by &e{archery_critdamage_add}&7. Improves accuracy greatly.
stringTranslations.archery_perk_6_description: &7Unlocks &eNetherite and Unholy Arrows&7, removes the damage penalty off of Infinity bows, and drastically improves the damage dealt over greater distances.
stringTranslations.archery_perk_c1_description: &7Unlocks &eCharged Shot&7. Charged shots benefit from extra piercing, knockback, speed, accuracy, and damage.
stringTranslations.archery_perk_c2_description: &7Charged shots gain &e{archery_chargedshotcharges_add}&7 and reduced cooldown. More charges, piercing, knockback, and damage. Charged shots now also ignore gravity and always fly at max speed.
stringTranslations.archery_perk_stealth_description: &7Hit shots are now guaranteed to critically hit if the enemy is looking away and out of combat. Critical hits deal &e{archery_critdamage_add}&7 more damage and cause bleeding.
stringTranslations.digging_perk_1_description: &7Speeds up your digging by &a{digging_diggingspeedbonus_add}&7, and you gain a few experience orbs per block.
stringTranslations.digging_perk_2_description: &7You start finding simple resources from the ground, and you gain more experience orbs per block.
stringTranslations.digging_perk_3_description: &7You learn the composition of the earth, and can now reproduce it (unlocks recipes for various ground-type blocks).
stringTranslations.digging_perk_a2_description: &7Suspicious blocks have an additional &a{digging_archaeologyrepeatchance_add} &7chance to return, and you gain a small chance (which increases around structures) to find suspicious sand or gravel while digging.
stringTranslations.digging_perk_b2_description: &7You start finding valuable resources from the ground.
stringTranslations.digging_perk_4_description: &7You'll occasionally start finding treasure while digging.
stringTranslations.digging_perk_combo_description: &7Unlocks several interactions allowing you to more easily detail your builds. (examples, putting moss on cobblestone, putting cracks in bricks)
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_a1_description: &7Decreases experience orb consumption by &b{enchanting_essencerefundfraction_add}&7, and lapis consumption by &b{enchanting_lapissavechance_add}
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_a2_description: &7Increases enchanting skill by &b{enchanting_enchantingskill_add}&7, decreases experience orb consumption by &b{enchanting_essencerefundfraction_add}&7, and lapis consumption by &b{enchanting_lapissavechance_add}
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_b1_description: &7You gain &b{enchanting_essencemultiplier_add} &7more experience orbs from everything, and level all skills &b{power_allskillexpmultiplier_add} &7faster
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_b2_description: &7Unlocks &bHexblade&7. You gain &b{enchanting_essencemultiplier_add} &7more experience orbs from everything, and level all skills &b{power_allskillexpmultiplier_add} &7faster
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_radiant_description: &7Hexblade deals &e&lHoly &7damage, especially effective against the undead and also nether creatures, though everything else is immune. You can switch Hexblade damage types at any time.
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_necrotic_description: &7Hexblade deals &8&lUnholy &7damage, useless against undead but effective against everything else. You can switch Hexblade damage types at any time.
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_2_description: &7Increases enchanting skill by &b{enchanting_enchantingskill_add}&7 and reduces experience orb consumption by &b{enchanting_essencerefundfraction_add}&7. You may pick between damage or protection enchantments to boost by &b+1&7 level
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_sharpnesses_description: &7Any new &bSharpness&7, &bSmite&7, &bImpaling&7, &bPower&7, and &bBane of Arthropods&7 enchantments are permanently buffed by 1 level. You may only pick once
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_protections_description: &7Any new &bBlast&7, &bProjectile&7, &bFire&7, and regular &bProtection&7, as well as &bFeather Falling&7 enchantments are permanently buffed by 1 level. You may only pick once
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_3_description: &7Increases enchanting skill by &b{enchanting_enchantingskill_add}&7. You may pick between Looting or Unbreaking to boost by &b+2&7 levels, or Fortune by +1 level
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_fortune_description: &7Any new &bFortune&7 enchantments are permanently buffed by &b1&7 level. You may only pick once
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_looting_description: &7Any new &bLooting&7 enchantments are permanently buffed by &b&l2&7 levels. You may only pick once
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_unbreaking_description: &7Any new &bUnbreaking&7 enchantments are permanently buffed by &b&l2&7 levels. You may only pick once
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_4_description: &7Increases enchanting skill by &b{enchanting_enchantingskill_add}&7. You may pick between any of all offensive, defensive, or utility enchantments to boost by &b+1&7 level
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_offensive_description: &7Any new &boffensive&7 enchantments are permanently buffed by &b1&7 levels. You may only pick once
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_defensive_description: &7Any new &bdefensive&7 enchantments are permanently buffed by &b1&7 levels. You may only pick once
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_utility_description: &7Any new &butility&7 enchantments are permanently buffed by &b1&7 levels. You may only pick once
stringTranslations.lightweapons_perk_2_description: &7Increases attack speed by &e{lightweapons_attackspeedmultiplier_add}&7, and grants &e{lightweapons_critchance_add} &7critical strike chance.
stringTranslations.lightweapons_perk_4_description: &7Increases attack speed by &e{lightweapons_attackspeedmultiplier_add}&7, and enemies are immune for &e{lightweapons_immunityreductionfraction_add} &7less
stringTranslations.lightweapons_perk_5_description: &7Increases damage by &e{lightweapons_damagemultiplier_add}&7, &eParry &7becomes much easier and stronger, and enemies are immune for &e{lightweapons_immunityreductionfraction_add} &7less.
stringTranslations.lightweapons_perk_6_description: &7Increases critical strike chance by &e{lightweapons_critchance_add}&7, and critical strikes deal &e{lightweapons_critdamage_add} &7more damage. Critical strikes now inflict &eBleeding&7, and bleeding deals &e{lightweapons_bleeddamage_add} &7more damage
stringTranslations.lightweapons_perk_a1_description: &7Unlocks &eWeapon Coating&7, allowing you to apply potion effects onto your weapons. Potion effects applied are reduced in strength and duration and last for &e{lightweapons_coatingcharges_add} &7hits
stringTranslations.lightweapons_perk_a2_description: &eWeapon Coating &7becomes even stronger, lasting longer, applying a greater effect, and staying on your weapons for &e{lightweapons_coatingcharges_add} &7more hits
stringTranslations.heavyweapons_perk_2_description: &7Increases power attack damage by &c{heavyweapons_powerattackdamagemultiplier_add}&7, and grants &c{heavyweapons_critchance_add} &7critical strike chance.
stringTranslations.heavyweapons_perk_3_description: &7Power attacks now deal &c{heavyweapons_powerattackfraction_add} &7splash damage in a &c{heavyweapons_powerattackradius_add}&7 block radius. Increases damage by &c{heavyweapons_damagemultiplier_add}
stringTranslations.heavyweapons_perk_4_description: &7Increases power attack damage by &c{heavyweapons_powerattackdamagemultiplier_add}&7, and you gain &c{heavyweapons_penetrationflat_add} &7armor penetration
stringTranslations.heavyweapons_perk_5_description: &7Increases damage by &c{heavyweapons_damagemultiplier_add}&7, power attacks deal much greater splash damage in a larger radius, and you gain &c{heavyweapons_penetrationflat_add}&7 additional armor penetration.
stringTranslations.heavyweapons_perk_6_description: &7Increases critical strike chance by &c{heavyweapons_critchance_add}&7, and critical strikes deal &c{heavyweapons_critdamage_add} &7more damage. Critical strikes now inflict &cBleeding&7, and bleeding deals &c{heavyweapons_bleeddamage_add} &7more damage
stringTranslations.heavyweapons_perk_a1_description: &7Unlocks &cWeapon Coating&7, allowing you to apply potion effects onto your weapons. Potion effects applied are reduced in strength and duration and last for &c{heavyweapons_coatingcharges_add} &7hits
stringTranslations.heavyweapons_perk_a2_description: &cWeapon Coating &7becomes even stronger, lasting longer, applying a greater effect, and staying on your weapons for &c{heavyweapons_coatingcharges_add} &7more hits
stringTranslations.heavyweapons_perk_combo_description: &7Gain &c{heavyweapons_penetrationfraction_add} &7armor penetration, &c{heavyweapons_stunchance_add} &7stun chance, and you deal &c{heavyweapons_damagetolightarmormultiplier_add} &7more damage for each piece of light armor the enemy wears
stringTranslations.heavyarmor_perk_2a_description: &7You only need to wear 3 pieces of heavy armor to benefit from heavy armor set bonuses. Heavy armor slows you down for half as much
stringTranslations.heavyarmor_perk_1b_description: &7Wearing a full set of heavy armor grants you &c{heavyarmor_sethealingbonus_add} &7additional healing. Heavy armor becomes &c{heavyarmor_heavyarmormultiplier_add} &7more protective
stringTranslations.heavyarmor_perk_2b_description: &7Wearing a full set of heavy armor grants you a &c{heavyarmor_setreflectchance_add} &7chance to reflect &c{heavyarmor_setreflectfraction_add} &7damage back to the attacker. Heavy armor becomes &c{heavyarmor_heavyarmormultiplier_add} &7more protective
stringTranslations.heavyarmor_perk_2_description: &7Wearing a full set of heavy armor grants you &c{heavyarmor_setknockbackresistance_add} &7knockback resistance, as well as immunity to &cWeakness&7, &cSlowness&7, and &cLevitation
stringTranslations.heavyarmor_perk_1c_description: &7Unlocks &cRage&7. Reaching low HP briefly grants you various powerful buffs to help you stay in a fight for much longer
stringTranslations.heavyarmor_perk_2c_description: &7Upgrades &cRage&7, increasing the strength and duration of its buffs and reducing its cooldown by half
stringTranslations.heavyarmor_perk_combo_description: &7Wearing a full set of heavy armor grants you &c{heavyarmor_setcritchanceresistance_add}&7 critical strike resistance and gain &c{heavyarmor_setimmunityfractionbonus_add} immunity
stringTranslations.lightarmor_perk_1a_description: &7Light armor slows you down half as much
stringTranslations.lightarmor_perk_2a_description: &7You only need to wear 3 pieces of light armor to benefit from light armor set bonuses. Light armor no longer slows you down
stringTranslations.lightarmor_perk_1b_description: &7Wearing a full set of light armor grants you &e{lightarmor_sethungersavechance_add} &7reduced hunger consumption. Light armor becomes &e{lightarmor_lightarmormultiplier_add} &7more protective
stringTranslations.lightarmor_perk_2b_description: &7Wearing a full set of light armor grants you a &e{lightarmor_setdodgechance_add} &7chance to dodge an attack. Light armor becomes &e{lightarmor_lightarmormultiplier_add} &7more protective
stringTranslations.lightarmor_perk_2_description: &7Wearing a full set of light armor grants you &e{lightarmor_setmagicresistance_add} &7magic damage resistance, as well as immunity to &ePoison&7, &eBlindness&7, and &eHunger
stringTranslations.lightarmor_perk_1c_description: &7Unlocks &eAdrenaline&7. Reaching low HP briefly grants you various powerful buffs to help you get away from danger
stringTranslations.lightarmor_perk_2c_description: &7Upgrades &eAdrenaline&7, increasing the strength and duration of its buffs and reducing its cooldown by half
stringTranslations.lightarmor_perk_combo_description: &7Wearing a full set of light armor grants you &e{lightarmor_setcritchanceresistance_add}&7 critical strike resistance and stun immunity
stringTranslations.farming_perk_1_description: &7Unlocks ability to right-click crops to harvest and replant them
stringTranslations.farming_perk_2_description: &7Crops grow faster, and yield some experience when harvested
stringTranslations.farming_perk_3_description: &7Crop harvest increases by &a{farming_farmingdrops_add}&7 and yield even more experience
stringTranslations.farming_perk_4_description: &7Crop harvest increases by &a{farming_farmingdrops_add}&7 and yield a lot of experience
stringTranslations.farming_perk_5_description: &7Unlocks &aField Harvest&7, an ability that allows you to harvest a large area of crops almost instantly
stringTranslations.farming_perk_1a_description: &7Animals grow up &a{farming_growuptimemultiplier_add} &7faster and drop &a{farming_butcherydrops_add}&7 more items. Bred animals grant &a{farming_breedingexperiencemultiplier_add} &7more experience orbs
stringTranslations.farming_perk_2a_description: &7Animals grow up &a{farming_growuptimemultiplier_add} &7faster and drop &a{farming_butcherydrops_add}&7 more items. Bred animals grant &a{farming_breedingexperiencemultiplier_add} &7more experience orbs, and you deal &aquadruple &7damage to animals
stringTranslations.farming_perk_1b_description: &7Bees no longer target you. Hives have a &a{farming_hivehoneysavechance_add} &7chance to refill after harvesting
stringTranslations.farming_perk_1c_description: &7You become immune against poisonous/rotten foods and they feed you &athrice&7 as much, &cbut all other foods lose &4{power_foodbonusvegetable_add}&c nutrition&7. Locks &cBalanced Diet
stringTranslations.farming_perk_2c_description: &7All foods, except poisonous/rotten ones, feed you &a{power_foodbonusvegetable_add} &7more. Locks &cTrash Diet
stringTranslations.fishing_perk_2_description: &7Increases experience orbs gotten from fishing by &b{fishing_fishingessencemultiplier_add}
stringTranslations.fishing_perk_6_description: &7Gain a &b{fishing_fishingdrops_add}&7 chance to double catch, as well as &b{fishing_fishingessencemultiplier_add} &7more experience orbs from fishing
stringTranslations.fishing_perk_combo_description: &7Unlocks ability to break down tools and equipment into their base parts
stringTranslations.heavyarmor_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your heavy armor level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &4{heavyarmor_heavyarmorexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &c{heavyarmor_damageresistanceperpiece_add} &7damage resistance, and &c{heavyarmor_critchanceresistanceperpiece_add} &7crit resistance per piece of heavy armor
stringTranslations.heavyarmor_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your heavy armor level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &4{heavyarmor_heavyarmorexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &c{heavyarmor_damageresistanceperpiece_add} &7damage resistance, and &c{heavyarmor_critchanceresistanceperpiece_add} &7crit resistance per piece of heavy armor
stringTranslations.lightarmor_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your light armor level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{lightarmor_lightarmorexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &e{lightarmor_damageresistanceperpiece_add} &7damage resistance, and &e{lightarmor_movementspeedperpiece_add} &7movement speed per piece of light armor
stringTranslations.lightarmor_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your light armor level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{lightarmor_lightarmorexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &e{lightarmor_damageresistanceperpiece_add} &7damage resistance, and &e{lightarmor_movementspeedperpiece_add} &7movement speed per piece of light armor
stringTranslations.archery_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your archery level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{archery_archeryexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &e{archery_bowdamagemultiplier_add} &7ranged damage, &e{archery_inaccuracy_add} &7inaccuracy, and &e{archery_bowcritchance_add}&7 crit chance
stringTranslations.archery_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your archery level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{archery_archeryexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &e{archery_bowdamagemultiplier_add} &7ranged damage, &e{archery_inaccuracy_add} &7inaccuracy, and &e{archery_bowcritchance_add}&7 crit chance
stringTranslations.fishing_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your fishing level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{fishing_fishingexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &b{fishing_fishingdrops_add} &7fishing drops, &b{fishing_fishingluck_add} &7fishing luck, and &b{fishing_fishingspeedbonus_add}&7 fishing speed
stringTranslations.fishing_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your fishing level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{fishing_fishingexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &b{fishing_fishingdrops_add} &7fishing drops, &b{fishing_fishingluck_add} &7fishing luck, and &b{fishing_fishingspeedbonus_add}&7 fishing speed
stringTranslations.heavyweapons_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your heavy weapons level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &4{heavyweapons_heavyweaponsexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &c{heavyweapons_damagemultiplier_add} &7attack damage, &c{heavyweapons_powerattackfraction_add} &7power attack damage, and &c{heavyweapons_critchance_add}&7 crit chance
stringTranslations.heavyweapons_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your heavy weapons level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &4{heavyweapons_heavyweaponsexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &c{heavyweapons_damagemultiplier_add} &7attack damage, &c{heavyweapons_powerattackfraction_add} &7power attack damage, and &c{heavyweapons_critchance_add}&7 crit chance
stringTranslations.lightweapons_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your light weapons level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{lightweapons_lightweaponsexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &e{lightweapons_damagemultiplier_add} &7attack damage, &e{lightweapons_attackspeedmultiplier_add} &7attack speed, and &e{lightweapons_critchance_add}&7 crit chance
stringTranslations.lightweapons_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your light weapons level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{lightweapons_lightweaponsexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &e{lightweapons_damagemultiplier_add} &7attack damage, &e{lightweapons_attackspeedmultiplier_add} &7attack speed, and &e{lightweapons_critchance_add}&7 crit chance
stringTranslations.farming_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your farming level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{farming_farmingexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &a{farming_farmingdrops_add} &7farming and butchery drops
stringTranslations.farming_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your farming level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{farming_farmingexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &a{farming_farmingdrops_add} &7farming and butchery drops
stringTranslations.digging_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your digging level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{digging_diggingexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &a{digging_diggingdrops_add} &7digging drops, &a{digging_diggingluck_add}&7 digging Luck, and &a{digging_diggingspeedbonus_add} &7digging speed
stringTranslations.digging_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your digging level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{digging_diggingexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &a{digging_diggingdrops_add} &7digging drops, &a{digging_diggingluck_add}&7 digging luck, and &a{digging_diggingspeedbonus_add} &7digging speed
stringTranslations.woodcutting_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your woodcutting level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{woodcutting_woodcuttingexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &a{woodcutting_woodcuttingdrops_add} &7woodcutting drops and &a{woodcutting_woodcuttingspeedbonus_add} &7woodcutting speed
stringTranslations.woodcutting_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your woodcutting level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{woodcutting_woodcuttingexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &a{woodcutting_woodcuttingdrops_add} &7woodcutting drops and &a{woodcutting_woodcuttingspeedbonus_add} &7woodcutting speed
stringTranslations.mining_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your mining level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &4{mining_miningexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &c{mining_miningdrops_add} &7mining and blasting drops and &c{mining_miningspeedbonus_add} &7mining speed
stringTranslations.mining_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your mining level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &4{mining_miningexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &c{mining_miningdrops_add} &7mining and blasting drops and &c{mining_miningspeedbonus_add} &7mining speed
stringTranslations.alchemy_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your alchemy level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{alchemy_alchemyexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &d{alchemy_genericbrewingskill_add} &7brewing skill and &d{alchemy_brewingtimereduction_add} &7brewing speed
stringTranslations.alchemy_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your alchemy level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{alchemy_alchemyexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &d{alchemy_genericbrewingskill_add} &7brewing skill and &d{alchemy_brewingtimereduction_add} &7brewing speed
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your enchanting level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{enchanting_enchantingexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &b{enchanting_enchantingskill_add} &7enchanting skill, and &b{enchanting_essencemultiplier_add} &7experience orbs
stringTranslations.enchanting_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your enchanting level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{enchanting_enchantingexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &b{enchanting_enchantingskill_add} &7enchanting skill, and &b{enchanting_essencemultiplier_add} &7experience orbs
stringTranslations.smithing_perk_ng1_description: &7Resets your smithing level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{smithing_genericexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you gain a permanent &e{smithing_genericcraftingskill_add} &7bonus to all your creations
stringTranslations.smithing_perk_ng2_description: &7Resets your smithing level back to 0, and reduces experience gained by &c{smithing_genericexpmultiplier_add}&7. In exchange, you again gain a permanent &e{smithing_genericcraftingskill_add} &7bonus to all your creations

fishing_perk_combo_messages: &8To salvage an item place it in a crafting grid
farming_perk_1_messages: &aRight-Clicking crops now harvests and replants them
farming_perk_1c_messages: &7You can no longer pick Balanced Diet
&8"I'm the Trash Man! I come out, I throw trash all over the- all over the ring! And then I start eatin' garbage!"
farming_perk_2c_messages: &7You can no longer pick Trash Diet
heavyarmor_perk_1c_messages: &7- Grants Strength I, Haste I, and Absorption I for 10 seconds
heavyarmor_perk_2c_messages: &7- Grants Strength III, Haste III, Absorption III, and Resistance I for 20 seconds
lightarmor_perk_2b_messages: &8Dodging an attack completely prevents damage. You must be facing the attacker to be able to dodge attacks
lightarmor_perk_1c_messages: &7- Grants Speed I, Jump Boost I, and Regeneration I for 10 seconds
lightarmor_perk_2c_messages: &7- Grants Speed III, Jump Boost III, Regeneration III, and Resistance I for 20 seconds
heavyweapons_perk_2_messages: &8Power Attacks are melee attacks dealt while falling, what vanilla Minecraft considers a 'crit'
heavyweapons_perk_3_messages: &7- Now deal &c{heavyweapons_powerattackfraction_add}&7 damage to all enemies in a &c{heavyweapons_powerattackradius_add}&7-block radius
heavyweapons_perk_4_messages: &8Armor penetration reduces the armor value of your attacked targets, increasing damage against them.
&8Targets without armor still take some extra damage
heavyweapons_perk_5_messages: &7- Now deal &c75%&7 damage to all enemies in a &c2&7-block radius
heavyweapons_perk_a1_messages: &8on top of a heavy weapon in your
heavyweapons_perk_combo_messages: &8Light Armor Damage is extra damage dealt for each piece of light armor the target is wearing
lightweapons_perk_3_messages: &8Activated by Right-Clicking with a light weapon in hand.
&8After having activated a parry, getting hit before the duration
&8ends reduces the damage taken and greatly weakens the attacker.
lightweapons_perk_a1_messages: &8on top of a light weapon in your
enchanting_perk_b2_messages: &7- Converts &b{enchanting_activeelementaldamageconversion_add}&7 of your damage into &b60%&7 elemental damage
&7- Can pick freely between Holy and Unholy damage
&8Elemental blade is toggled by using the "switch hands" key (default F)
enchanting_perk_3_messages: &7to boost by &b+2 levels&7, or Fortune by &b+1 level&7.
enchanting_perk_4_messages: &7Pick between all offensive, defensive, or utility
digging_perk_2_messages: &7- Bones, String, Sticks, Coal, Gunpowder, etc.
digging_perk_a2_messages: &aRare chance to find new suspicious blocks
digging_perk_b2_messages: &7- Raw Gold, Raw Iron, Raw Copper, Ender Pearls, Amethyst, etc.
digging_perk_4_messages: &7- Diamonds, Emeralds, Echo Shards, Enchanted Books, Ancient Debris, etc.
digging_perk_combo_messages: &7    to a rougher variant. For example
&7    Melts certain blocks or infuses them
archery_perk_stealth_messages: &8looking away and not being in combat
mining_perk_a3_messages: &eFortune II to put on your TNT.
mining_perk_a3silktouch_messages: &8All your TNT now breaks blocks as
&8if broken by a Silk Touch pickaxe
mining_perk_a3fortune_messages: &8All your TNT now breaks blocks as
&8if broken by a Fortune II pickaxe
mining_perk_b2_messages: &8Sneak while breaking a block to rapidly
alchemy_perk_3_messages: &8on top of another potion in your
woodcutting_perk_3_messages: &8Sneak while breaking the base of a
&8tree to quickly harvest the entire tree
party-level-description-1: &7Get passive buffs for being around allies
party-level-description-2: &7Get passive buffs for being around allies
party-level-description-3: &7Get passive buffs for being around allies
party-level-description-4: &7Get passive buffs for being around allies
party-level-description-5: &7Get passive buffs for being around allies
skill-level-up-power: TITLE(&7You leveled up to &e%level%&7;&7Check &e/skills &7for available perks;40;5)
